definition[0]: to send out electronic signals, messages etc using radio, television, or other similar equipment
example[0]: The US Open will be transmitted live via satellite.
example[1]: The system transmits information over digital phone lines.
definition[1]: to send or pass something from one person, place or thing to another
example[2]: Mathematical knowledge is transmitted from teacher to student.
definition[2]: if an object or substance transmits sound or light, it allows sound or light to travel through or along it
example[3]: Data can now be transmitted at speeds up to 25 times faster than previously.
